column2: 'I don't care if he's my great-cousin, he's a son of a whore!' - Rudoly Streykarion
Some scholars believe that the Dark Ring is actually the location of an impact of some kind of great rock. Who threw that rock, no one knows.
In the depths of Innerweld, some explorers found strange and incredibly old tombs made from a strange white metal deep.
Sometimes, death is not the end.
